title: [CONUS] Creed Aventus / Virgin Island Water
content:
Up for sale are: 
 
 $150 shipped Creed Aventus - A42C13ZZ01 - tester with black cap 95% 75mL 
 
 
 $110 shipped Creed Virgin Island Water - heavy lime to my nose 99.9% 75mL 
 
 
Please see swap thread for decants I have for swap. 
 
Thank you
